document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of the Anthicidae and pediline Pyrochroidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) of Iran, with thirteen new country records

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated checklist of the Anthicidae and pediline Pyrochroidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) of Iran, with thirteen new country records

bibRefCitation.refString: KREKICH-STRASSOLDO, H. VON (1928) UEbER Anthicus tristis SCHM. UND EINIGE VERWANDTE ARTEN. Coleopterologisches Centralblatt, 3, 104 - 111.

subSubSection.paragraph: Published data. Iran ( Kejval 1998 , Persia; Сhandler et al . 2008, checklist); Fars ( Kejval 1998 ); Сhaharmahal va Bakhtiari, Kuhgiluye o Buyer-Ahmad, Tehran ( Kejval 2007 ).
